str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Singular

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An evil-spirit, demon; a heathen deity. Neuter of a derivative of daimon; a d?Monic being; by extension a deity.

parse: Verb - Pluperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To want for myself; I want, need; I beg, request, beseech, pray. Middle voice of deo; to beg, i.e. Petition.
I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and luo; to free fully, i.e. relieve, release, dismiss, or let die, pardon or divorce.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
